title: David Henderson on the Essential UCLA School of Economics
description: Economist and author David Henderson talks about his book (co-authored with Steve Globerman) The Essential UCLA School of Economics with EconTalk host Russ Roberts. Much of the conversation focuses on the work of Armen Alchian and Harold Demsetz, who both saw economics as a powerful tool for understanding human behavior and how the world works.
author: webmaster@econlib.org (EconTalk: Russ Roberts)
